description: The Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker - Special Episode DLC introduces eighteen new challenges, including five brand-new courses. By purchasing the Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker – Special Episode DLC before March 14th on the Nintendo eShop, you’ll get early access to one of the courses, Shifty Shrine.  The remainder of the courses will be available on March 14th.
name: Captain Toad™: Treasure Tracker – Special Episode (Shifty Shrine)
